title.narrative: OP3: PROGRAMME SUPPORT/PLANNING, M&E

description.narrative: Effective and efficient management of the Education Programme., which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid), Learning Outcomes, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, national and sub-national Government Ministries and other key stakeholders have improved capacity to implement and monitor inclusive, equitable and quality ECE services.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Effective and efficient management of the Education Programme.

description.narrative: UNICEF Lao PDR efficiently mobilized the necessary technical expertise through staff and partnerships to provide strategic and technical advice and guidance to MoES, strengthen capacity, engage in partnerships, and effectively and efficiently manage the implementation of the Education programme. This has contributed to accelerated reforms in the education sector to improve quality and address inequities. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of children supported with distance/home-based learning [COVIDSitRep]
Number of schools implementing safe school protocols (COVID-19 prevention and control) [COVIDSitRep]

System Strengthening - EMIS - Availability of an Education Management Information System that transparently feeds findings back to communities or school management committees - score (1-4), see guidance
System Strengthening - Emergency preparedness - Comprehensive and updated risk assessment of the education sector - score (1-4), see guidance
System Strengthening - Learning assessment - Existence of a national/system-level large scale assessment, including for early grades - score (1-4), see guidance

System Strengthening - Innovations - Availability of strong evidence of successful and cost-effective innovations to improve access and learning for the most disadvantaged children - score (1-4), see guidance

target.value: 2020: Draft education cost effectiveness analysis report available

title.narrative: Robust evidence available to identify and respond to key barriers and bottlenecks for access, quality and equity of basic education

target.value: 2020:Draft dropout study, analysis of learning outcomes
